languages.text: Дает выбраной цели дополнительных ход с 2 AP и 4 MP

traits.locale_text: Дает выбраной цели дополнительных ход с 2 AP и 4 MP

languages.text: Selects an ally and immediately grants them an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Выбирает союзника и немедленно предоставляет ему {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Selects an ally and immediately grants them an extra turn with 2 AP and 4 MP.
Selects an ally and immediately grants them an extra turn with 2 AP and 4 MP.
Selects an ally and immediately grants them an extra turn with 2 AP and 4 MP.

languages.text: Bir dost birim seçer ve ona anında 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'ye sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırır.
languages.original_text: Selects an ally and immediately grants them an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bir dost birim seçer ve ona anında 2 EP ve 4 HP'ye sahip bir ek tur kazandırır.
Bir dost birim seçer ve ona anında 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'ye sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırır.

languages.text: Elige a un aliado y le otorga inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
languages.original_text: Selects an ally and immediately grants them an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Elige a un aliado y le otorga inmediatamente un turno extra con 2 PA y 4 PM.
Elige a un aliado y le otorga inmediatamente un turno extra con 2 PA y 4 PM.

languages.text: 选择一名盟友，使其立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，拥有2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与4点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: Selects an ally and immediately grants them an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 选择一名盟友，使其立刻获得一个额外回合，拥有2点行动点数与4点移动点数。
选择一名盟友，使其立刻获得一个额外回合，拥有2点行动点数与4点移动点数。

languages.text: Sélectionne un allié et lui octroie immédiatement un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
languages.original_text: Selects an ally and immediately grants them an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Sélectionne un allié et lui octroie immédiatement un tour supplémentaire avec 2 PA et 4 PD.
Sélectionne un allié et lui octroie immédiatement un tour supplémentaire avec 2 PA et 4 PD.
Sélectionne un allié et lui octroie immédiatement un tour supplémentaire avec 2 PA et 4 PD.

languages.text: 味方1体を選択し、2{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}および4{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}で即座に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を付与する。
languages.original_text: Selects an ally and immediately grants them an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 味方1体を選択し、2APおよび4MPで即座に追加ターンを付与する。
味方1体を選択し、2APおよび4MPで即座に追加ターンを付与する。

languages.text: Wählt einen Verbündeten aus und gewährt ihm einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Selects an ally and immediately grants them an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wählt einen Verbündeten aus und gewährt ihm einen Zusatzzug mit 2 AP und 4 BP.
Wählt einen Verbündeten aus und gewährt ihm einen Zusatzzug mit 2 AP und 4 BP.
Wählt einen Verbündeten aus und gewährt ihm einen Zusatzzug mit 2 AP und 4 BP.

languages.text: Выбирает союзника и немедленно предоставляет ему {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
languages.original_text: Selects an ally and immediately grants them an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and 4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Выбирает союзника и немедленно предоставляет ему дополнительный ход с 2 ОД и 4 ОП.
Выбирает союзника и немедленно предоставляет ему дополнительный ход с 2 ОД и 4 ОП.
